Sermons

The Preaching Ministry of Immanuel Baptist Church

Prodigals

The story of the “Prodigal Son” is an amazing parable that reveals a lot about God’s grace, our depravity and the utter failure of religion. In this mini-series Pastor Hayden is taking a deep look at all of the prodigals in Luke 15 - not just the son.
